text: Madison Plaza is a skyscraper in Chicago, Illinois. The building rises 599 feet (182 m) in the Chicago Loop. It has 45 floors. It was completed in 1982. Madison Plaza currently stands as the 36th-tallest building in the city. ==Related pages== * List of tallest buildings in Chicago ==References== ==Other websites== * Images of the "Dawn Shadows" sculpture Category:Skyscrapers in Chicago Category:1982 establishments in the United States Category:1980s establishments in Illinois
title: Madison Plaza
